name: Our last day
description:
Are you ready to give everything to save the world?

Four friends set out to enjoy their last day together before going their separate ways. A small cabin by the lake, friends, and time. What more could you want? But of course, it comes differently than you think.

Make decisions that can change lives because the ultimate journey begins NOW. 

But remember, every single decision can affect the ending. Your ending.

Controls:

Left click/Spacebar - move on to the next dialog

Left click twice - move faster to the next dialog

Esc/Del. - opens menu

Right click - goes back

Creative Team:

Lukas Zilke: programming

Jacqueline Kless: 2D art/UI

Devin Nelson: music/audio

Marianne Ehrhardt: writing

Disclaimer:

Use the Full Screen Mode to get the Best Player Experience and avoid Issues/Bugs
